name: Special Agent Jack Klangmon
description:
Welcome Agent Klergsam. This is your most important mission to date...

You are Special Asian Jack Klingmen and you wake up from a fever dream inside a giant pool table with MegaMan X flipbots coming at you!

You can use WASD to move. Right-click shoots your gun to hurt them bad enemy type guys. Left-click turns your laser pointer on and off (its a piece of shit that you got from a pawn shop and sometimes (all the time) it doesn't aim too good.)

Try your best to hurt the flipmens and if you do, you win. If you don't they will touch you and give you a tickle.
